summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of Northeast 137th Street from 15th Avenue Northeast to 22nd Avenue Northeast; and from 26th Avenue Northeast to approximately 175 feet easterly of 27th Avenue Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6415, and appropriating money from the Water fund in aid thereof as a loan.
